${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:SuperChargedStar.NAME: Super Charged Star
${modID}:SuperChargedStar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Can be ${modID}:Upgraded any number of times. NL Deal hand-size (!${modID}:XhandSize!) X 3.

${modID}:CoreOverdrive.NAME: Core Overdrive
${modID}:CoreOverdrive.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, recover !${modID}:FINALREGEN! Energy.

${modID}:StarReserve.NAME: Star Reserve
${modID}:StarReserve.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, and Retain every *Little *Star in your hand, for this turn. NL On the next turn set their Energy Cost down to 0.

${modID}:QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
${modID}:QuickDraw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, 3 times. NL Draw a card after dealing damage. NL Inflict !${modID}:BurnQuickDraw! ${modID}:Burneth.

${modID}:StarFall.NAME: Star Fall
${modID}:StarFall.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !${modID}:DRAWCARD! cards.

${modID}:MoonlightRebound.NAME: Moonlight Rebound
${modID}:MoonlightRebound.DESCRIPTION: Put !${modID}:CARDDRAW! random cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Deal 3 + damage equal to the total cost of the cards moved into the hand.

${modID}:CounterMeasures.NAME: Counter Measures
${modID}:CounterMeasures.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Imitation NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:Infinita.NAME: Infi'nita
${modID}:Infinita.DESCRIPTION: Deals damage based on the amount-of-relics (!${modID}:RELICAMOUNT!) X !${modID}:RELICDMG!. NL The cost of the card equals amount-of-relics (!${modID}:RELICAMOUNT!) / !${modID}:CARDCOST!

${modID}:DragonRoar.NAME: Dragon Roar
${modID}:DragonRoar.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Imitation NL Inflict !${modID}:WEAK! Weak onto all Enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AxisBreak.NAME: Axis Break
${modID}:AxisBreak.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Imitation NL Deal !D! Damage X times. NL If on use, had !${modID}:ENREQ!, Deal !${modID}:EXPLO! Damage.

${modID}:AdrenalineAddict.NAME: Adrenaline Addict
${modID}:AdrenalineAddict.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Imitation NL Exhaust any amount of Cards in hand. NL For each Card Exhausted: NL Recover 1 Energy and Draw 2 Cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HellBurn.NAME: Hell Burn
${modID}:HellBurn.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Become afflicted with !${modID}:BURN! ${modID}:Burneth upon using a card.

${modID}:ExcessRemoval.NAME: Excess Removal
${modID}:ExcessRemoval.DESCRIPTION: Select up to !${modID}:CardAmount! Cards to Discard. Draw 1 Card.

${modID}:MoonStance.NAME: Moon Stance
${modID}:MoonStance.DESCRIPTION: Add *Crescent *Moon *Slash and *Moonlight *Slash onto Hand. NL (If hand were full, discard Cards until theres enough space). NL Gain 1 Intangible this turn. NL (Exit Stance once CMS and MLS have been Exhausted).

${modID}:CrescentMoonSlash.NAME: Crescent Moon Slash
${modID}:CrescentMoonSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If this killed an enemy, gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MoonlightSlash.NAME: Moonlight Slash
${modID}:MoonlightSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. NL If this killed an enemy, gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WeaknessExploit.NAME: WeaknessExploit (ATTACK)(COMMON)(0)
${modID}:WeaknessExploit.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Imitation NL Deal !D! damage. NL Inflict !${modID}:Vulne! Vulnerable.

${modID}:FingerSnap.NAME: Finger Snap (ATTACK)(COMMON)(2)
${modID}:FingerSnap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !${modID}:LilStars! *Little *Stars into your Draw Pile.

${modID}:StarPlan.NAME: Star Plan (SKILL)(RARE)(3->2)
${modID}:StarPlan.DESCRIPTION: Discard hand. NL Move any *Little *Star located in the Draw Pile into the hand.
${modID}:StarPlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard hand (Excluding Star Reserve). NL Move any *Little *Star located in the Discard Pile or the Draw Pile into the hand.

${modID}:ForwardThinking.NAME: Forward Thinking (SKILL)(UNCOMMON)(1)
${modID}:ForwardThinking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E][E][E][E] next turn. NL Inflict 4 ${modID}:Burneth onto self.

${modID}:HarsherFlames.NAME: Harsher Flames (POWER)(COMMON)(2)
${modID}:HarsherFlames.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Imitation NL Upon inflicting ${modID}:Burneth to an enemy, inflict !${modID}:Burn! additional ${modID}:Burneth.

${modID}:Vengeful Actions.NAME: Vengeful Actions (POWER)(RARE)(3->2)
${modID}:Vengeful Actions.DESCRIPTION: If received unblocked damage on the enemy turn, do 1 out-of 3: NL Draw 1~3 Cards next turn. NL Recover 1~3 [E] next turn. NL Recover 5~15 Health.
${modID}:Vengeful Actions.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upon taking unblocked damage, do 1 out-of 3: NL Draw 1 Cards next turn. NL Recover 1 [E] next turn. NL Recover 8 Health.

${modID}:ShadowWall.NAME: Shadow Wall (ATTACK)(UNCOMMON)(2)
${modID}:ShadowWall.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Imitation NL Gain !B! Block. NL Inflict !${modID}:Burn! ${modID}:Burneth on all enemies.

${modID}:LuckyStarCoin.NAME: Lucky Star Coin (POWER)(UNCOMMON)(2-3)
${modID}:LuckyStarCoin.DESCRIPTION: When discarding a card, have a 30% chance of gaining !${modID}:Gold! Gold.
